functionDecorators.name: addDestination
functionDecorators.description: Add the destination contract address for a given chain id.

functionDecorators.name: addTokens
functionDecorators.description: Add supported tokens to the contract.

functionDecorators.name: confirmTicket
functionDecorators.description: Confirms the ticket once liquidity is provided on the Layer-1 Buddle Bridge contractcan only be called by the cross domain messenger.

parameterDecorators.name: _ticket
parameterDecorators.description: The ticket to be confirmed.

parameterDecorators.name: _destChain
parameterDecorators.description: The chain ID for the destination blockchain.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokens
parameterDecorators.description: The token addresses included in the ticket.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: The token amounts included in the ticket.

parameterDecorators.name: _bountyAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: The bounty amounts included in the ticket.

parameterDecorators.name: _firstTransferInTicket
parameterDecorators.description: The initial transfer ID included in ticket.

parameterDecorators.name: _lastTransferInTicket
parameterDecorators.description: The final transfer ID included in ticket.

parameterDecorators.name: _stateRoot
parameterDecorators.description: The state root included in ticket.

parameterDecorators.name: _provider
parameterDecorators.description: The liquidity provider on the L1 bridge contract.

functionDecorators.name: createTicket
functionDecorators.description: Create a ticket before providing liquidity to the L1 bridge LP creates this ticket and provides liquidity to win the bounty.

parameterDecorators.name: _destChain
parameterDecorators.description: The chain ID for the destination blockchain.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: previously `widthdraw` Deposit funds into the contract to start the bridging process.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of the token being bridged is address(0) if base token.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to be bridged.

parameterDecorators.name: _destination
parameterDecorators.description: The destination address for the bridged tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _destChain
parameterDecorators.description: The chain ID for the destination blockchain.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initialize the contract with state variables.

parameterDecorators.name: _version
parameterDecorators.description: Contract version.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeBasisPoints
parameterDecorators.description: The fee per transfer in basis points.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeRampUp
parameterDecorators.description: The fee ramp up for each transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _buddleBridge
parameterDecorators.description: The Layer-1 Buddle Bridge contract.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setXDomainMessenger
functionDecorators.description: Set the addresses of Optimism's cross domain messenger.

parameterDecorators.name: _messenger
parameterDecorators.description: Optimism L2 cross domain messenger.

parameterDecorators.name: _stdBridge
parameterDecorators.description: Optimism L2 standard bridge.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateContractFeeBasisPoints
functionDecorators.description: Change the contract fee basis points.

functionDecorators.name: updateContractFeeRampUp
functionDecorators.description: Change the contract fee ramp up.

functionDecorators.name: updateDestination
functionDecorators.description: Change the Destination contract address for the given chain id.

functionDecorators.name: updateStandardBridge
functionDecorators.description: Update the address of the standard bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _newBridgeAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Optimism L2 standard bridge.

functionDecorators.name: updateXDomainMessenger
functionDecorators.description: Update the address of the cross domain messenger.

parameterDecorators.name: _newMessengerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Optimism L2 cross domain messenger.
